    • Method Detail

      • addExtension

        void addExtension()
        Database extension needed for password hashing extension will be set once as database table has been created

      • emailChange

        void emailChange(java.lang.String login,
                 java.lang.String email)
        Method for email change, email can be changed by admin from admin zone or by user from user profile
        Parameters:
        login - - username of wich user mail have to be edited
        email - - new email address

      • getForumUser

        java.util.List<ForumUser> getForumUser()
        Method will return list of all registered users
        Returns:
        - list of all registered users

      • getImage

        byte[] getImage(java.lang.String login)
        Method for selecting user profile picture from database
        Parameters:
        login - - user login to be used for selecting specific profile picture
        Returns:
        - profile picture for specific user

      • getUserCount

        long getUserCount()

      • isAdmin

        boolean isAdmin(java.lang.String login)
        isAdmin method to select only users with admin rights(needed for specific functions)
        Parameters:
        login - - user login to be used for selecting user rights from database
        Returns:
        - true or false if logged user have admin rights

      • isBan

        boolean isBan(java.lang.String login)
        isBan Method is selecting users with BAN activated
        Parameters:
        login - - selecting users by login
        Returns:
        - users with ban activated

      • isPlayer

        boolean isPlayer(java.lang.String login)
        isPlayer Method is to get login data for specific user from database
        Parameters:
        login - - selecting specific user by login
        Returns:
        - login of user name

      • login

        ForumUser login(java.lang.String login,
                java.lang.String password)
        Login Method for user login, method will select user and hashed password from database
        Parameters:
        login - - user login to be selected
        password - - user password to be selected
        Returns:
        Selected user name and password

      • passChange

        void passChange(java.lang.String login,
                java.lang.String password)
        Method for password change, admin can change password for all users or users can update their password from user profile page.
        Parameters:
        login - - of which user password have to be changed
        password - - new password

      • register

        void register(ForumUser user)

      • setRights

        void setRights(java.lang.String login,
               int value)
        Method for changing user rights(Admin/user)
        Parameters:
        login - - to change/update specific user
        value - - to set specific value (admin/user)

      • updateImage

        void updateImage(java.lang.String login,
                 byte[] pic)
        Method for updating/changing profile picture from user profile
        Parameters:
        login - - to change profile picture for specific login
        pic - - picture to be uploaded
